transcript:
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Uh yes hi good evening. Prince Sport company se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Who is this?
Executive: Hi sir my name is Naveen Awasthi. I was calling from IndiaMART office Noida. How are you?
Customer: Good.
Executive: Hi sir actually I had
Customer: That was with you before also sir on 30th October you must have remembered.
Executive: Yeah right.
Customer: Where we discussed about the issue that you are facing on IndiaMART.
Executive: Yeah.
Customer: Right? Right. Recently what you have done? Recently what you have done?
Customer: Have you done done my problem?
Executive: Sir you were facing conversion issues from past three months. You told me that not a single deal converted from past three months.
Customer: Same thing I have repeated lot of times and I am repeating again that is the separate issue. Main is that ki export we are not getting any kind of export inquiry or lead. So total wastage of time was in export leads or inquiries. So your concerned person was said that we are unable to reach the people for exports. So I want to know that you are unable to reach the people for inquiry or leads for friend sports company. So why you are not closing that or not rewarding the payment? Why you are wasting my money or time?
Executive: Sir we we didn't told you that we are unable to get leads.
Customer: Yeah yeah yeah yeah you are marketing that the inquiries that we are getting from the market the demand that buyer are sending us we are sharing each and every requirement with you. But since last last six months we have done nothing from export is totally useless and totally best of money. Even your partner sorry or other person who is talking with friend sports company from IndiaMART they also accepted that we are unable to give you the inquiries or leads we are not reaching to customers.
Executive: If I talk about the buyleads sir I I have checked your consumption behavior.
Customer: Right now I am right now I am talking about only export because export is zero definitely zero. So do you have any solution for that? Are you refunding my payment if you are unable to do that or any other I am also talking about export only.
Executive: Yeah I am also talking about export sir.
Customer: You if I talk about export sir on a monthly basis if I see on an average you are consuming 25 leads sir.
Executive: Sir that's I have to I have to consume. Yes are you getting the point?
Customer: Yes. Otherwise it will be wasted but if I am getting 32 leads per month I am getting 32 no results. What is meaning of that sir?
Executive: Are you getting my point?
Customer: You are saying that you are not getting leads if you are yeah yeah we are not getting any we are trying by email by WhatsApp by calling we have done each and everything but we are not getting any response. Mostly 99% fake calls no response. We have already done the by mistake we inquired or single single piece we needed COA needed lots of issues there is no response. If I am getting same thing I am saying to you if I am getting 32 leads per month then 32 is no no result.
Executive: Yeah. Sir result oriented if you are talking about sir I will just tell you here whenever you connect to any buyer sir if if you are consuming let's say 25 leads in a month and you are connecting with the buyer and buyer are not responding or they are not giving any business to you that doesn't mean that IndiaMART is not giving you inquiries. We are providing you inquiries.
Customer: IndiaMART is providing me fake or unnecessary leads we don't need that. Have you you are getting you are getting my point? You have done your inquiries we have listen to me bro. You have given to me you are talking about the graphs you have a graph I am getting 32 leads I am getting 50 inquiries you are talking about that am I right?
Executive: Correct sir.
Customer: So we don't need that because we have not deal or not done any kind of deal from export. Totally waste of time or money. Even you and your other person who is working with IndiaMART employees or manager or sales manager I don't know who is that person. They have also accepted that sir we are extremely sorry we are unable to give you export leads or quality. Got it? So this is not that IndiaMART is listen to me I am getting lots of calls from my regular customers local. So I don't have much time to for it. I want to tell you that last time I don't know who was that guy I spoke with him he told me said give me one or two days I will give you feedback what can we do and same question other person you calling and same again and again I don't have much time to send repeat you. I need solution what what is the solution what should we do what can you do?
Executive: What you are expecting from IndiaMART sir because IndiaMART doesn't commit any how can I say? It's your we we we provide only IndiaMART is saying that we are unable to give you business or leads or inquiry. We are committing you to give inquiry sir we can't get give business sir. We can't commit any business.
Customer: You are not giving any kind of business to me. That's what I was saying sir we are here to provide inquiries not business sir. I am saying to you inquiry or lead is are 99% is fake or unnecessary.
Executive: What is mean of that? If how how it is fake sir if you are connecting that buyer I have already send you lot of time email email or customers details the fake mentioned with contact number with email IDs I have mentioned you email you or IndiaMART.
Customer: Sir please do verify that please do verify that first.
Executive: Sir I can check each and every inquiry please send me the details on my number I will definitely check it again. I I just want to inform you every day every day I cannot give to other person to WhatsApp one please do deal one one person okay?
Customer: Sir you call they have to tomorrow will sub call some other person. So you are also wasting my time too. We have done video meeting with your marketing staff sir. We have done already a video meeting with your marketing staff.
Executive: I know your good name?
Customer: My name is Naveen sir.
Executive: Naveen Mr. Naveen. Yes sir.
Executive: So Mr. Naveen I I think you have already spoken with me last week.
Customer: I have spoken to you on 30th of October sir we had discussed this what discussion with that and same question same question you are asking me why you are asking me again we already discussed about that.
Executive: That that that's the expectation that you are having for conversion of business we can't commit any conversion sir.
Customer: You are you are just not getting my point. My point is that we are getting inquiries and purchasing the leads okay but they are fakes false sir.
Executive: I I am telling you sir please share please to me I will definitely share the feedback I have already shared you bro please check your email.
Customer: If you go to that sir if you share the same I will share share hi on your WhatsApp please share it to me again I will get it checked sir.
Executive: Sir after 5 pm office is off please do contact tomorrow 11 am I will told to my staff they will send you.
Customer: No problem sir tomorrow is holiday I will connect you day after tomorrow let's see what we can do on that sir.
Executive: Yeah sure.
Customer: Okay thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting export inquiries or leads.

- Feels export leads are a waste of time.

- Wants to know why payment is not rewarded.

- Claims IndiaMART provides fake leads.

- Wants a solution or refund for export issues.



Resolution:

- Executive stated they provide inquiries, not business.

- Executive asked customer to share details for review.

- Executive mentioned contacting the next business day.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect day after tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- export, leads, refund, inquiries, fake leads
